titleStmt.title: Edgar R. Bissell to James F. Robinson
CWG7973

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p: The undersigned, an employee of the Quarter Master's Dep't in this city, is desirous of obtaining a commission as Notary Public, the business of this office rendering the employement of a Notary, a matter of frequent occurrence.

Very Respectfully
Your Obt servant
Edgar R. Bissell

His Excellency
J. R. Robinson
Governor of the State of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky.
Will Gov. Robinson please issue a Commission to Mr Russel as Notary & greatly oblige

Yr Obt Srvt
J. D. Osborne

Jefferson Co
Notary
E. R. Bissell
Comm. Issd May 25. 1863.
